title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Digital Game-Based Social Learning Design—Blended Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device operation skills and intermediate or higher understanding of social phenomena
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can design and execute social issue analysis scenarios using digital games at least three times.
Learners can propose methods to enhance learner engagement by over 20% through game-integrated instructional design.
Learners can implement at least one game-based learning flow aligned with IMS Learning Design standards in a BYOD environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
